CustomField.description: In the "Approval Process: Approver's Queue" flow, we use this field to find records of the relevant object that have been submitted for approval. We cannot simply use the object's api name as this isn't recorded in the underlying system data that we are querying.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Simply go to any record of the specific object, find the 15-character record Id in the URL, and copy its first 3 characters
CustomField.label: First 3 Characters on Record Ids
